verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: as lebanon drowns in its own trash] [ARG0: people] [V: look] [ARGM-GOL: to themselves — not the government] — for solutions intermittent electricity and water dismal telecommunications at extortionate prices an exasperating government little fazes the lebanese yet lebanon trash crisis a three - year tale of tragicomic ineptitude has enraged people and brought them to the streets in anger los angeles times government naameh sukleen lebanon nahr ibrahim beirut
